systems.name: Flammarion
systems.notes: Corporate world (Ling-Standard Products). Excellent starport with shipyard. Naval and Scout bases on Vestri.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion Primary

stellarInfo.description: A yellow-white main sequence dwarf, slightly hotter and more massive than Sol.

celestialObjects.gmNotes: F8 V white main sequence. Mass 1.18 Sol.

cameraSettings.description: Wide corona view with inner system visible

celestialObjects.name: Vestri
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Hot barren rockball. Too close to star - surface temps 400K+. Imperial military installations only.

cameraSettings.description: Stark harsh world with star glow on horizon

celestialObjects.name: Naval Base Flammarion
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Imperial Naval Base on Vestri. Primary system defense operations. RESTRICTED. Hardened against solar radiation.

celestialObjects.name: Scout Base
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Imperial Scout Service auxiliary base. X-Boat relay station. Solar observation post.

cameraSettings.description: Compact station with star in view

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Medium world, very thin tainted atmosphere. Pop 700,000. Corporate gov (LSP). TL11.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion Highport
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Class A Excellent starport. Full shipyard facilities. 9,575 port employees.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion Belt
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Main planetoid belt. Mining operations by LSP subsidiaries.

cameraSettings.description: Wide belt view showing asteroid distribution

celestialObjects.name: JSI Asteroid Base
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Jump Scout Intelligence listening post. Hollowed-out asteroid. Officially 'survey station'. Monitors Sword Worlds traffic. CLASSIFIED.
